name: Dusty Crib
description:
Explore the house where something mystical once happened. One sunny day, all the residents of this house seemed to disappear, leaving behind only vague memories and a mystery shrouded in the dust of centuries.

You have to search every room and floor to collect all the evidence that sheds light on the reason for the disappearance of family members.

Dusty Crib is a hidden object game. Slow gameplay will allow you to concentrate on searching and finding all the necessary things from the list to complete the level. Look more carefully as many items end up in the most unexpected places.

Game Features:
- Low Poly graphics
- Atmosphere of mysticism
- A game of attention to detail
